issue.title: [Python] Allow execplan to handle Filter nodes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create a `filter_table` helper function in `_exec_plan` that allows passing a `Table` and an `Expression` to filter the table with the provided expression.
